title: Pastor A.R. Bernard: Four Things Women Want from a Man
description: Pastor A.R. Bernard is the founder of the largest church in New York City, Brooklyn’s Christian Cultural Center. In his book “Four Things Women Want from a Man,” Pastor Bernard reveals the qualities men need to have for a happy, lasting relationship. The pastor says he can help you make your relationship one that is “built to weather any storm.”
author: podcasts@own.oprah.com (Oprah)
